title: creating a logo, creative type, resources
content:
laid off so I am doing a web site for a non profit Rape Crisis Center.

I am trying to either morph the R into a graphic  
use some type of creativity, I just feel a bit stuck now.

I am looking for good resources on the web also..

One of the problems is that this graphic has to be non gender  
and a bit subdued too I would think...

So far I have thought of rainbows, stairs, (hands may be not good so  
I thought links, chain, rope, as if someone is not touching but holding  
on )

So the logo or graphic does not discriminate because this center  
even sees kids.

I am trying to come up w/ something non threatening.
author: kelvis97
